metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6199 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
ObjectSocketWrapper.java in Gradle 2.12 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted serialized object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gradle - 2.13-4
libgradle-core-java - 2.13-4
libgradle-plugins-java - 2.13-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gradle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13-4').
